CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Pricing_Cluster__c)<> null,
IF(
TEXT(Accreditation_Type__c) <> 'Maintenance',
IF(Nokia_CPQ_Env_Type__c='sCRM',HYPERLINK('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=PriceCatalogExport&mode=touchless&outputType=None','Export'),HYPERLINK( Nokia_Env_URL__c & '/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=PriceCatalogExport&mode=touchless&outputType=None','Export')),
IF(Nokia_CPQ_Env_Type__c='sCRM',HYPERLINK('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=PriceCatalogMaintenanceExport&mode=touchless&outputType=None','Export'),HYPERLINK( Nokia_Env_URL__c & '/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=PriceCatalogMaintenanceExport&mode=touchless&outputType=None','Export'))
),"Pricing Cluster Required")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Exports are available in Notes & Attachments section of the Accreditation record
CustomField.label: Partner Price Catalog
